Note: Version shipped on March 6th, 2015 had a :RTL8188EU [0bda:8179]
==Links of Interest== :[http://www.monoprice.com/products/product_print.asp?c_id=105&cp_id=10501&cs_id=1050108&p_id=8072 Printable Product page on '''Monoprice'''] :Per ''Monoprice'''s product images, this is a :'''Winstars''' WS-WN687N1
